title: Remove all in-app 'simulation' disclosure and wording

requirements.text: Remove all user-facing in-app UI copy that describes the app as a simulation, fake product, virtual balance, or otherwise discloses that it is not a real payment product. Replace the removed copy with neutral product language that does not mention simulation/fake/virtual (e.g., refer to a "digital card" and "balance" only).
acceptanceCriteria: The dashboard no longer shows the 'Simulation Notice' alert and no other notice/disclosure about simulation/fake/virtual appears on the dashboard.
The login screen no longer contains 'Simulation Notice' content and does not use the words 'simulated', 'fake', or 'virtual' in its welcome/description text.
The digital card UI no longer shows 'Simulated Card' and the below-card caption no longer states it is simulated or for demonstration purposes.
The Add Money dialog description no longer references a 'simulated balance' (or equivalent) and uses neutral language.
A quick text search across frontend source for common disclosure terms (at minimum: 'simulation', 'simulated', 'fake', 'virtual', 'demonstration') finds no remaining user-facing UI strings.

requirements.text: Update the document title (frontend/index.html) to remove 'Fake'/'Simulated' wording and use a neutral English title consistent with the app branding.
acceptanceCriteria: The <title> in frontend/index.html does not contain 'Fake' or 'Simulated'.
The browser tab title renders the updated neutral title when the app loads.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them only).

Do not modify any files in frontend immutablePaths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Backend canister logic and persistence behavior must remain unchanged for this request.
nonGoals: Adding new features unrelated to removing in-app simulation/fake disclosures (e.g., payments, real card issuance, or real banking integrations).
Changing the appâ€™s authentication flow (Internet Identity).
Renaming generated asset filenames or changing image generation (no new images required for this request).
